requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: At least GT1030
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
